evs.metric.results
Class MetricResultByLeadTime

java.lang.Object
  evs.metric.results.MetricResult
      evs.metric.results.MetricResultStore
          evs.metric.results.MetricResultByLeadTime

public class MetricResultByLeadTime
extends MetricResultStore

Stores a set of metric results by lead time in hours relative to the epoch (i.e. equivalent to Calendar.getTimeInMillis()*1000*60*60). Extends evs.metric.MetricResult for convenience. A single store supports only one class of metric result so that the getter methods will always return an object of that class or null.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

MetricResultByLeadTime

public MetricResultByLeadTime(int storedID)
Constructs a store with a specified type of metric result as the store type. Subsequently attempting to add metrics of a different result type will throw an exception. See the evs.metric.results.MetricResult class for supported types.

Parameters:
storedID - the result type id

aggregate

public MetricResult aggregate(MetricResult[] input,
                              VectorFunction func,
                              double[] weights)
                       throws MetricResultException
Applies an aggregation function to the corresponding values (e.g. same matrix position) in the input results, placing a Metric.NULL_DATA if all of those values are Metric.NULL_DATA. Throws an exception if the inputs are not of the same class. The return type may not correspond to the input type if the result of the aggregation function cannot be stored in the input type. Specifically, any aggregation of a result that contains integers should ALWAYS return a result that contains doubles, as the aggregation function is guaranteed to do so. For example, the average of a set of integers may not be an integer. Specify a set of weights for each metric that are constant across all forecast lead times. The weights must sume to 1.

Specified by:
aggregate in class MetricResult
Parameters:
input - the input results
func - the aggregation function
weights - the constant weights to apply across all lead times
Returns:
the aggregated result
Throws:
MetricResultException

getResultsForScoreComp

public MetricResultByLeadTime getResultsForScoreComp(int comp)
                                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Convenience method that returns results for a specified component of a score decomposition. Throws an exception if the stored results are not of type evs.metric.results.MetricResultByThreshold, which in turn contains type evs.metric.results.EnsembleScoreDecomposition or if the specified component is not one of the class variables in that class.

Parameters:
comp - the score component
Returns:
the results for a specified component of a score
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
